description:
A modern and secure instant messaging for people, business and healthcare


[Fixed] Reactions: Fixed issue where icons rendered incorrectly as grey instead of white
[Fixed] Reactions: Fixed issue where reaction toolbar content and order may change based on selected state
[Fixed] Reactions: Fixed issue with reaction toolbar scrolling incorrectly in one direction
[Fixed] Reactions: Notification defaults set up correctly for reactions
[Fixed] Reactions: Reaction chooser now shows the add icon on subsequent reactions
[Fixed] Reactions: Removing a reaction could cause the reaction chooser to disappear
